title: Melktert (South African buttermilk tart)
ingredients: ['1 1 (320g) packet ready rolled shortcrust pastry', '4 eggs', '200g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '115g unsalted butter, melted', '350ml buttermilk, at room temperature', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', 'dark brown soft sugar for sprinkling']
